links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
maple: b:= proc(n) b(n):= `if`(n=0, 1, ilcm(b(n-1), n)) end:a:= n-> mul(i[1]^irem(i[2], 2), i=ifactors(b(n))[2]):seq(a(n), n=0..40);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 01 2016
author: _Labos Elemer_, Aug 29 2000
extensions: a(0)=1 inserted by _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 01 2016
